类 KingPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChessPiece
      • KingPiece

  • public class KingPiece
extends ChessPiece
    An class that encodes specific rules for king pieces.
    作者:
    Bruce Dong

    • 构造器详细资料

      • KingPiece

        public KingPiece(ChessGame.Side side,
                 int row,
                 int col,
                 java.lang.String label,
                 ChessBoard board)
        Stores a chess piece
        参数:
        side - the side of the piece
        row - the number of rows at the chessboard
        col - the number of columns at the chessboard
        label - the lable of the piece
        board - the board that its belong to

    • 方法详细资料

      • resetMoved

        public void resetMoved()
        Rests the time of moved

      • isLegalMove

        public boolean isLegalMove(int toRow,
                           int toColumn)
        Determines if it is legal to move the piece to its given location.
        指定者:
        isLegalMove 在类中 ChessPiece
        参数:
        toRow - the row of the square the piece want to go
        toColumn - the column of the square the piece want to go
        返回:
        true if the piece is allowed to move there

      • isLegalNonCaptureMove

        public boolean isLegalNonCaptureMove(int toRow,
                                     int toColumn)
        Determines if it is legal to move the piece to its given location without capture.
        覆盖:
        isLegalNonCaptureMove 在类中 ChessPiece
        参数:
        toRow - the row of the square the piece want to go
        toColumn - the column of the square the piece want to go
        返回:
        true if the piece is allowed to move there without capture
